price: Babwire uti “Ngaho nimutegereze, mu by’ukuri ndi kumwe namwe mu bategereje.”
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
